Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content: The flex cache caches the HTML output of JSPs in the memory (RAM) of your server. We demonstrate different variants of caching. Therefore, we include two JSPs into each other, both showing the current time. Playing with the cache directives set on the JSPs, the time is refreshed differently. Futhermore, we show how navigation should be cached.

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: Caching is important - learn at a simple example how flex cache configurations change dynamic behavior.
